summary: Come get the American flag today and solve your problems with Democracy's way!
descriptionHtml:
Are you feeling like a patriot but don't have the means to do so? Are you feeling a little less free while wandering around Skyrim and don't know how to fix that? What this mod does is it adds the US flag to the outside of Breezehome in Whiterun. With this flag I can guarantee you at least one of the following on the list will occur 
<br /><br />- Feelings of freedom 
<br /><br />- Spontaneous instances of uncontrollable shouting 
<br /><br />- Random clapping when finishing a hearty meal 
<br /><br />- No fear of Brittish oppression 
<br /><br />In order to aquire it in-game, you need to speak to Proventus Avenicci and purchase the living room furnishings if you haven't done so. 
<br /><br />If for some reason you want to use this mod in one you are working on, go ahead. Just remember that while freedom isn't free, my mod is and always will be.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Also, keep in mind I will not be responsible for saves that get mucked up or otherwise become overrun with dangerous amounts of tyranny. That said, this is a joke mod so don't take it too seriously. If you want you can find this mod on steam's workshop with the same title under my username smu_dude07
author: cheatr92
